mapper.insert: insert into hm_crm_gold_temp (FORMID, FORMNAME, SRCID, SRCNAME, TYPEID, TYPENAME, MEMO, COLLECTERID, COLLECTERNAME, ADID, ADADDRESS, KZNAME, KZPHONE, WECHAT, ADDRESS, REMARK, IP, IPADDRESS, COMPANYID, STATUSID, CREATETIME) values (#{formId}, #{formName}, #{srcId}, #{srcName}, #{typeId}, #{typeName}, #{memo}, #{collecterId}, #{collecterName}, #{adId}, #{adAddress}, #{kzName}, #{kzPhone}, #{wechat}, #{address}, #{remark}, #{ip}, #{ipAddress}, #{companyId}, #{statusId}, unix_timestamp(now()))
mapper.update:
update hm_crm_gold_temp set
FORMID = #{formId},
FORMNAME = #{formName},
SRCID = #{srcId},
SRCNAME = #{srcName},
TYPEID = #{typeId},
TYPENAME = #{typeName},
MEMO = #{memo},
COLLECTERID = #{collecterId},
COLLECTERNAME = #{collecterName},
ADID = #{adId},
ADADDRESS = #{adAddress},
KZNAME = #{kzName},
KZPHONE = #{kzPhone},
WECHAT = #{wechat},
ADDRESS = #{address},
REMARK = #{remark},
ip = #{ip},
IPADDRESS = #{ipAddress},
COMPANYID = #{companyId},
STATUSID = #{statusId}
where id = #{id}
